response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique offering that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it would greatly benefit you. We're offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000, which I believe strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing value for us. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
